text: The 1902 New York Giants season was the franchise's 20th season. The team finished with a 48–88 record, in eighth and last place in the National League, games behind the Pittsburgh Pirates. Their .353 winning percentage remains the worst in franchise history. At the end of September, owner Andrew Freedman left baseball, with John T. Brush taking over as majority owner and team president. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Notable transactions === * August 1902: Jim Jones was released by the Giants.Jim Jones page at Baseball Reference === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
